title: Purifying Water by Boiling
brief: Kill harmful organisms in water through proper boiling techniques.
steps: Step 1: Bring water to a rolling boil.
Step 2: At sea level: boil for 1 minute minimum.
Step 3: At altitude: add 1 minute of boiling time for each additional 300 meters above sea level.
Step 4: Alternative method: boil for 10 minutes regardless of altitude.
warnings: Ensure water reaches a full rolling boil, not just simmering.
Allow water to cool before drinking to prevent burns.
Boiling only kills organisms - it does not remove chemical contamination.
